```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(flextable)
library(readxl)
library(extrafont)
library(forcats)
library(writexl)
```


```{r}
#remove identifiers and demographic data

headscan_full<-read_excel("C:\\Users\\19177\\OneDrive - Colostate\\Desktop\\Dissertation\\headscan_dissertation\\headscan_full.xlsx")
str(headscan_full)

PCAdata <- headscan_full[-c(1, 29, 30, 31)]


str(PCAdata)
```


```{r}
#deleting rows with NA values (for example only)
PCAdata <- PCAdata %>% drop_na()

#numerical class
#PCAdata <- PCAdata %>% mutate_if(is.character, as.numeric)
PCAdata <- as.data.frame(sapply(PCAdata, as.numeric))

#rounding
PCAdata <- round(PCAdata, 1)
```

```{r}
#calculate principal components
results <- prcomp(PCAdata, scale=TRUE)

#reverse the signs (R calculates eigenvectors in negative direction)
results$rotation <- -1*results$rotation

#display PCs
results$rotation
```

```{r}
var_explained = results$sdev^2 / sum(results$sdev^2)

library(ggplot2)
```


```{r, fig.width=5, fig.height=6}
qplot(c(1:27), var_explained) + 
  geom_line() + 
  xlab("Principal Component") + 
  ylab("Variance Explained") +
  ggtitle("Scree Plot") +
  ylim(0, 1)
```
